categoryNotes.value:
The Global Immersive Learning Institute is planned to launch in the Fall of 2022.  This Institute will have Fall and Spring, in-person sessions, along with 4 virtual masterclasses. These institutes will include case studies along with industry-specific curriculum and lectures.

More details to come.

categoryDescription.value: The GILI will focus on Preparation for career, entrepreneurship, or graduate study for LEADing for Life Fellows (college sophomores - seniors). This learning institute is an intensive immersion experience focusing on the five 21st Century emerging industries.
